mapper.delete: update chas_xt_bbkz set isdel = 1,xgsj = date_trunc('second', now()) where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into chas_xt_bbkz (ID, LRR_SFZH, LRSJ, LRR_XM, XGR_SFZH, XGSJ, XGR_XM, ISDEL, CLIENT_NO, CLIENT_TYPE, INSTALL_ID, UPDATE_ID, RECENT, EXPLAIN, DATA_FLAG ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lrsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lrrXm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{xgrXm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{clientNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{installId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{explain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update chas_xt_bbkz set LRR_SFZH = #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LRSJ = #{lrsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LRR_XM = #{lrrXm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XGR_SFZH = #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XGSJ = #{xgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, XGR_XM = #{xgrXm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISDEL = #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CLIENT_NO = #{clientNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLIENT_TYPE = #{clientType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSTALL_ID = #{installId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_ID = #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECENT = #{recent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, EXPLAIN = #{explain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_FLAG = #{dataFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, LRR_SFZH, LRSJ, LRR_XM, XGR_SFZH, XGSJ, XGR_XM, ISDEL, CLIENT_NO, CLIENT_TYPE, INSTALL_ID, UPDATE_ID, RECENT, EXPLAIN, DATA_FLAG from chas_xt_bbkz where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ID, LRR_SFZH, LRSJ, LRR_XM, XGR_SFZH, XGSJ, XGR_XM, ISDEL, CLIENT_NO, CLIENT_TYPE, INSTALL_ID, UPDATE_ID, RECENT, EXPLAIN, DATA_FLAG from chas_xt_bbkz where 1 = 1
and client_no = '${clientNo}'
and client_type = '${clientType}'
and recent = '${Isrecent}'
and isdel = 0
mapper.update: update chas_xt_bbkz set RECENT = '0' where CLIENT_TYPE = '${clientType}'
